title: HSS-5.0.2-install-plain-714PH12.rar
description:
DESCRIPTION

VPN (Virtual Private Network) is a network technology that enables secure extension of the local network (LAN) over a public or uncontrolled network such as the Internet. Allows the computer on the network send and receive data on shared or public networks like a private network with full functionality, security and management policies on a private network. This is accomplished by establishing a virtual connection point to point using dedicated, encrypted connection or combination of both methods.
 
Put more sharply and understandable, is a way to surf the Internet for camouflaged, where our IP is masked and websites believe that visiting a different IP to ours.
 
Some uses of a VPN may be the Internet connection among branches of a business safely skip some censorship of some countries, as we sail like we were in another country, access to web sites geolocation restrictions ... for example, to see a Spanish TV broadcasts only allowed to view the content to users who have an IP of Spain from an American country. The possibilities to use a VPN are many. Another use is to simply prevent search engines, ISPs, the government itself, etc ... .rastreen our steps on the Internet.
 
As an example I mention that to prove this version, had some restrictions to download server that had blocked me for completing my share of daily downloads ... with this VPN could finish downloading the server to believe that it was a different user.
 
HotspotShield requires no special settings or configure your current connection, simply connect you hit the button and within seconds you'll be inside the VPN. VPNs can be selected from different countries, we are currently located in the United VPNs are available. UU., UK, Australia, Japan, Canada, Germany, France, Mexico, China, Czech Rep., Denmark, Hong Kong, India, Netherlands, Turkey, Ukraine, Russia and Sweden
